overview: Paris in June 2009. The title leads us to expect a personal diary entry made in a city that has often been used as a setting for ideas of love. In Gröller´s short film, which does nothing to conceal the excitement, the romantically charged eroticism becomes a gentle but undisguised form of pornography. The sex act is finally performed with a dildo, an erection does not ensue. (Dietmar Schwärzler)
title: Paris June 2009
